002package com.commercetools.api.models;
003
004import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
005
006import com.commercetools.api.models.cart.Cart;
007import com.commercetools.api.models.cart.CartReference;

020import com.commercetools.api.models.common.ResourceIdentifierBuilder;

065import com.commercetools.api.models.store.StoreReference;
066import com.commercetools.api.models.store.StoreResourceIdentifier;
067import com.commercetools.api.models.tax_category.TaxCategory;
068import com.commercetools.api.models.tax_category.TaxCategoryReference;
069import com.commercetools.api.models.tax_category.TaxCategoryResourceIdentifier;
070import com.commercetools.api.models.type.Type;
071import com.commercetools.api.models.type.TypeReference;

074import com.commercetools.api.models.zone.ZoneReference;
075import com.commercetools.api.models.zone.ZoneResourceIdentifier;
076
077public interface ReferenceConverter {
078
079    static <T extends ResourceIdentifier> T toResourceIdentifier(Identifiable<?> reference, Class<T> clazz) {
080        try {
081            T resourceIdentifier = clazz.getDeclaredConstructor().newInstance();
082            resourceIdentifier.setId(reference.getId());
083            return resourceIdentifier;
084        }
085        catch (InstantiationException | IllegalAccessException | NoSuchMethodException
086                | InvocationTargetException ignored) {
087        }
088        return null;
089    }
090
091    static CartResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(CartReference reference) {
092        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().cartBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
093    }
094
095    static CartDiscountResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(CartDiscountReference reference) {
096        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().cartDiscountBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
097    }
098
099    static CategoryResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(CategoryReference reference) {
100        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().categoryBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
101    }
102
103    static ChannelResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(ChannelReference reference) {
104        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().channelBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
105    }
106
107    static CustomerResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(CustomerReference reference) {
108        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().customerBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
109    }
110
111    static CustomerGroupResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(CustomerGroupReference reference) {
112        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().customerGroupBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
113    }
114
115    static DiscountCodeResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(DiscountCodeReference reference) {
116        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().discountCodeBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
117    }
118
119    static InventoryEntryResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(InventoryEntryReference reference) {
120        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().inventoryEntryBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
121    }
122
123    static OrderResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(OrderReference reference) {
124        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().orderBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
125    }
126
127    static OrderEditResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(OrderEditReference reference) {
128        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().orderEditBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
129    }
130
131    static PaymentResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(PaymentReference reference) {
132        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().paymentBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
133    }
134
135    static ProductResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(ProductReference reference) {
136        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().productBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
137    }
138
139    static ProductDiscountResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(ProductDiscountReference reference) {
140        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().productDiscountBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
141    }
142
143    static ProductTypeResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(ProductTypeReference reference) {
144        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().productTypeBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
145    }
146
147    static ReviewResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(ReviewReference reference) {
148        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().reviewBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
149    }
150
151    static ShippingMethodResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(ShippingMethodReference reference) {
152        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().shippingMethodBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
153    }
154
155    static ShoppingListResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(ShoppingListReference reference) {
156        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().shoppingListBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
157    }
158
159    static StateResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(StateReference reference) {
160        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().stateBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
161    }
162
163    static StoreResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(StoreReference reference) {
164        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().storeBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
165    }
166
167    static StoreResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(StoreKeyReference reference) {
168        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().storeBuilder().key(reference.getKey()).build();
169    }
170
171    static TaxCategoryResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(TaxCategoryReference reference) {
172        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().taxCategoryBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
173    }
174
175    static TypeResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(TypeReference reference) {
176        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().typeBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
177    }

180        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().zoneBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
181    }

185    }
186
187    static CartDiscountResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(CartDiscount reference) {
188        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().cartDiscountBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();
189    }
190
191    static CategoryResourceIdentifier toResourceIdentifier(Category reference) {
192        return ResourceIdentifierBuilder.of().categoryBuilder().id(reference.getId()).build();

273    }
